title: Kerbdog
description:
both Kerbdog albums.
1994 self titled "kerbdog" and 1997 "on the turn."
"mexican wave" from "on the turn" is one of my favourite song of all time.
a must have for fans of Metallica or similar bands.
in 1998, lead singer cormac battle and drummer darragh butler, went on to form Wilt whose first album "bastinado" i also have and will be sharing along with some live recordings obtained from their website. Wilt's second album "my medicine" i also had, but it was stolen when i had the stereo taken from my car! if anyone has a copy and is willing to share, PLEASE post on this site and send me a message (put a comment on this torrent or whatever), 'cause i'd love to have another copy and it's impossible to find in the shops.
anyway, after getting this, get the stuff i posted for Wilt as well, it's a bit more pop-ish, but still cracking stuff.
